name: Brain Rot (JynJynx)
description:
Brain Rot is about trying to find yourself again…

Or losing yourself forever.

The pain of hunger is matched just as equally as the pain of the heart.

Which will you succumb to?

Brain Rot is a Solo TTRPG

A game for exploring a version of yourself that is lost, that’s far away form their own emotions.

You have the choice…

Do you want to go back?

Or would it feel better to be alone?
